Haemoglobin estimation
Th e initial haemoglobin level will serve as a baseline with which the later results, obtained 
at the three subsequent antenatal visits, can be compared. Haemoglobin estimation can be 
done at SCs or the outreach level by the Sahli method. 
Antenatal Care and Skilled Attendance at Birth by ANMs/LHVs/SNsGUIDELINES
